profile.name: Gavin Hensley
profile.current_role: Product Engineer / Customer Success Engineer / Deployment Engineer at APIsec
profile.education: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering - Western Governors University (2025)

active.name: Professional OS (working title)
active.tagline: Your professional identity, version-controlled. Stop re-explaining yourself to AI.
active.success_milestone: 10 paying customers using the framework to generate resumes or content, with at least 3 reporting time savings

active.name: Dev Genesis
active.tagline: From idea to coding in 30 minutes. Stop configuring, start building.
active.success_milestone: 10 developers use Dev Genesis to bootstrap a project and report that setup time was reduced to under 30 minutes

active.name: Vibiom
active.success_milestone: Successfully orchestrate 3 agents to build a complete backend API from a specification

active.name: TemperedUI
active.tagline: Beautiful components that protect by default. Ship secure apps without writing security code.
active.success_milestone: TemperedUI is used in 3 production projects (internal or external) and prevents at least one documented security vulnerability

active.name: MindTrace
active.tagline: Log student behavior in 30 seconds. Simple, fast, and built for educators who don't have time to waste.
active.success_milestone: 5 teachers or counselors use MindTrace for 30 days and report it saves them time compared to their previous system

planned.name: DevGauntlet
planned.tagline: No tutorials. Just challenges. Build like a professional developer, not a student.

planned.name: ScopeCreep
planned.tagline: Automated RLS testing for databases. Catch authorization bugs before they reach production.

planned.name: InstAPI
planned.tagline: Mock APIs in seconds. Stop waiting for backend, start building frontend.

planned.name: OpenOrbit
planned.tagline: Build in public, together. A social platform for tech creators sharing projects, not resumes.

tampertantrum_labs.tagline: Disrupting Auth Flows and Naptime Schedules
